title: Bug 3666: Code Completion Hungry code assist
description: Under certain circumstances code assist eats too much code. Consider the enclosed class. As a programmer, I must add a parameter to the baz call in bar to make the program correct.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Write a class similar to the provided example.
2. Call the baz method with the foo method as a parameter in the bar method.
3. Observe that the code assist eats too much code.
4. Expect the code assist to give the desired code:

baz(x.foo(), x.foo())

Note: The choice between replacing until the end or until the cursor location should be conditioned by a keystroke (enter=replace until end, insert=replace until cursor location).
